techmeme.title: Anthropic's Claude adds Research, capable of searching the web and internal documents to give comprehensive answers, in beta for Max, Team, Enterprise plans (Ben Sherry/Inc)

Whistleblower: at NLRB, DOGE staff disabled monitoring tools, deleted logs, one worked on "NxGenBdoorExtract"; one DOGE account tried to log in via a Russian IP (Jenna McLaughlin/NPR)
Source: Anthropic could launch a "voice mode" feature for Claude as soon as this month, which will initially roll out on a limited basis (Bloomberg)
Anthropic says Claude now integrates with Google Workspace for access to Gmail, Calendar, and Google Docs, coming first to Max, Team, Enterprise, and Pro plans (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
